instructions_to_main_agent: 2. GLOBAL CSS: Update index.css to include the 'Outfit' and 'Satoshi' fonts. Set body background to #050505.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'MainLayout' component that implements the 3-column glass grid. Do NOT use a simple flex row; use CSS Grid for stability.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components (Dialog, Popover, Card), override their default white/black backgrounds with 'bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10'.
5. CHAT: The chat area must feel like it's floating. Use a subtle gradient mask at the top so messages fade out as they scroll up.
6. NITRO: Create a 'Nitro' page that uses the 'Liquid Pink' background image with a parallax effect.
7. CRITICAL: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the glass backgrounds. Use 'text-white' for primary and 'text-zinc-400' for secondary.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, channel items).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
